Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Aww, nooo... I did it again. The beds
are too soft and inviting...
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Eeep! A customer?! <sp:5:0:0>Who's sleeping?
I wasn't sleeping! <sp:5:0:0>Not me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Welcome to the Swallow's Roost Inn!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We don't have any other guests at the
moment, so rest easy and rest well!
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Morning, mister! How about that silky-
soft Rito-down bed, huh?
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Rise and shine, mister! How about that
silky-soft Rito-down bed, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I bet you had nice, fluffy dreams on that
nice, fluffy pillow!
Talk2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm preparing the beds so any guest who
comes to stay gets a good sleep!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I get too sleepy to work when the sun
starts to go down, but I'll get the hang
of it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Come and stay with us anytime, mister!
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Oh! The sun's down, mister!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>How about that silky-soft Rito-down bed,
huh? <sp:5:0:0>I bet you had nice, fluffy dreams on
that nice, fluffy pillow.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sleep_00>*yawn* <sp:5:0:0>You must be tired after a long
day's trip getting here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks so much for coming! <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to
the <clr:0000>Swallow's Roost Inn<clr:ffff>!
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>A silky-soft Rito-down bed is made with
looots of Rito feathers. It's soft and fluffy
and gives the bestest sleeps ever.<sp:0:4:0>If you only sleep in one bed here at the
Swallow's Roost, make it that one!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>As soon my head hits the pillow, it's like
someone threw a blanket over me. <sp:5:0:0>N-not
that I ever use the beds!<sp:0:4:0>When you wake up again, you'll be full of
energy and ready to go!
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm making sure the beds are tidy so our
guests can sleep soundly!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I don't have to run the whole inn now,
but I still wanna help! <sp:5:0:0>Pretty grown-up of
me, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Make sure you come and stay with us
whenever you're tired, mister!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>A regular bed is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, and a
silky-soft Rito-down bed is <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>OK, got it. I'll give you a chirp when it's
morning. Sleep well, mister!
Talk2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>If you stay up late and don't get enough
sleep, you might conk out on the job.<sp:0:4:0>So I always get plenty of sleep. You don't
stay up too late either, OK, mister?
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>OK, got it. I'll give you a chirp when it's
noon. Sleep well, mister!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Awww, OK. Come again when you wanna
use one of our comfy beds!
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>OK, got it. I'll give you a chirp when it's
nighttime. Sleep well, mister!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Better make sure I don't conk out too early...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmmm...nope. I don't think you have
enough rupees for that. Save up some
more so you can sleep in our comfy beds!
Talk2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Ugh, I really wanted to sleep in some
more, but it's work time now. Gotta keep
my eyes open for customers...
Talk1014: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Sooo, how long do you wanna sleep?
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome! You're standing in the grand
<clr:0000>Swallow's Roost Inn<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks a ton for making it all the way out
here in the middle of a blizzard!
Talk1016: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Good morning, mister! Did you sleep OK?
Talk1017: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, mister! It's time to get up!
Talk2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm making sure the beds are tidy so our
guests can sleep soundly!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Sometimes I end up taking a nap without
meaning to, but I'll get the hang of it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Come and stay with us anytime, mister!
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sleep_01>This is a pretty weird wakeup time, huh?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>*yaaaaaawn* <sp:5:0:0>I already nodded off once today,
but...<sp:5:0:0>I wanna go back to bed...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm checking the beds to make sure that
our guests who arrive late have a good
sleep when they stay with us.<sp:0:4:0>Every single bed is super soft!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Hee-hee-hee. I don't have to run the inn,
but I'm still working hard to help out.<sp:5:0:0>
Come and stay with us anytime, mister!
